data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Isabel, Solomon Islands.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Isabel, Solomon Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Isabel words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.section_summary: On average, 4 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Isabel, Solomon Islands.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, cause the 8,173 believers in Isabel to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Isabel, Solomon Islands who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Isabel with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Isabel, Solomon Islands will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the state of Isabel to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...
